sql.where:
BOARD_NUM > 0
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND BOARD_WRITER LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNA q LEFT JOIN QNA_FILES qf ON q.BOARD_NUM = qf.BOARD_NUM WHERE q.BOARD_NUM = #{board_num}
mapper.insert:
SELECT BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO QNA ( BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, BOARD_HIT, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_CATEGORY, REF, STEP, DEPTH, DEL ) VALUES ( #{board_num}, #{board_title}, #{board_writer}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, #{board_contents}, 'Q', #{board_num}, 0, 0, 0 )

INSERT INTO QNA ( BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, BOARD_HIT, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_CATEGORY, REF, STEP, DEPTH, DEL ) VALUES ( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{board_title}, #{board_writer}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, #{board_contents}, 'Q', #{ref}, #{step}, #{depth}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET STEP = STEP + 1 WHERE REF = #{ref} AND STEP > #{step}
mapper.delete: UPDATE QNA SET DEL = 1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{board_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_FILES (FILE_NUM, BOARD_NUM, FILE_NAME, ORI_NAME) VALUES (FILES_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{board_num}, #{file_name}, #{ori_name})
